name: Fishing Fanny
description: Go fishing with Fanny. Slide Fannys boat in position using your finger. Hold finger on screen to drop fishing line. Playing against timer, catch number & type of fish indicated to pass level. Catch wrong fish & level goal goes back up (lose what you've caught). Catch bonus items for extra points. Watch out for junk! Junk knocks fish & bonuses off fishing line. Have fun & please share with friends
